metadata.name: Original Painting
metadata.description:
Capital-rhythm is a world within VRChat constructed around the prompt "K-pop debut
performed by capitalism." In this project, K-pop is a dance music genre with group
choreography of idolized singers, idols. The project explores the K-pop phenomenon as a
reflection of our increasingly enumerable culture in parallel to technological development. The
prompt stemmed from my interest in the desire to mirror our times through art. What is the
essence of the culture of our times, and how can artists capture it within their work? What is the
inner need of capitalism that perpetuates the creation and distribution of popular culture
objects? By contemplating the causality of the coercive nature of commercial culture in the
form of sound and image in the entertainment industry, we can think about the present and
future of the social system we live in.

Presented NFT is Original Painting of Capital-Rhythm idols, HYPE, framed in a custom made metal frame.
